mods.abstract: $25 REWARD. RANAWAY from the Plantation of the undersigned, on Bayou Bœuf, in the Parish of Avoyelles, on Sunday night, the 9th October inst., a negro-man, named AMEDEE or MEDEO, aged about 24 years. This boy is black, about 5 feet 9 inches high, stoop shouldered, speaks French and bad English, and is one of those that the undersigned bought from Geo. K. Wartelle, deceased, in March last. He ranway because he committed a murder on the person of his wife, on the plantation above mentioned, during the night of his departure. The above reward will be paid to whomsoever shall apprehend said boy and deliver him to the undersigned or lodge him in Jail. BEN PRESCOTT. Bayou Bœuf, Avoyelles, Oct. 21st, 1859.

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
